lines.text: Tell me, do you know a guy called Mario who lives around here?
There are a thousand Marios around here.
Yes, but this one is a thief.

[seeing other prisoners smoking in the prison yard]
May your father and mother drop dead if you have a cigarette and aren't sharing.
Stealing is a serious profession. You need serious people, not people like you. All you can do at your best is work.
